content: rainbow dots blanket by jellina verhoeff is made in scheepjes metropolis this is one of many designs published by scheepjes in their yarn - the after party booklets released with a new design every 2 weeks also available in print form scheepjes stockists **materials** scheepjes metropolis colour pack 75% extra fine merino wool 25% nylon 80 x 10g/40m yarn a metropolis colour pack x 1 scheepjes metropolis 75% extra fine merino wool 25% nylon 50g/200m yarn b 025 nice x 3 balls 3mm crochet hook **gauge/gauge** before blocking square measures 14 x 14cm 5 5 x 5 5in using a 3mm hook **measurements** 132 x 160cm 52 x 63in this crochet pattern contains a written pattern plus chart the pattern is available as a digital download in dutch german spanish french and english uk and us terms the pattern is also available as a hardcopy booklet in dutch uk english and german available from scheepjes retailers
